p: The cavitation number, computed according to Equation (1) and the method mentioned in Section 2.1, was in the range of 0.3 to 1.1 in both tests SFN_T1 and SFN_T2, thus falling in the range of developed cavitation, as defined in Section 2.1. Based on the estimated average flow (330 L/min), and the water volume (120 L), the average frequency of passages through the cavitation reactor was about 2.75 per min.
